## dimensionsFeature variable

This feature enables receiving the full width and height of an element identified by `tagName` in the WebView pixels unit, including border widths, but excluding margins. The first element matching the provided tagName is retained. A new event will be triggered on every resize.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dimensionsFeature: Feature<DimensionsOptions, 'onDimensions', DimensionsObject>
```
